mapper.select: select * from tbl_user where user_sessionkey = #{user_sessionkey} and user_sessionlimit > now()
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_birth, user_image, user_sex, user_status, user_youtube, user_auth, user_sessionkey) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_birth}, #{user_image}, #{user_sex}, #{user_status}, #{user_youtube}, #{user_auth}, #{user_sessionkey});
